Html:
Hello

I am currently a PVP Resto Druid but I have 2 sets of healing gear.  When I load my PVP set which has around 1100 + Heals but 0 HPS all the Bars just show Mp5.  The red HpS bars are all gone except for on the very highest pieces of armor.   Maybe I just don't understand what is happening but having the Cover of Ursol with one gem combination being worth 17.85 points total and the same Helm with a slightly different gem be worth 747.34 total seems a bit silly.  Is there anything I can do to fix this?  As a temporary fix I just equipped the highest rated helm and now I can see but this greatly distorts my totals.


Thanks
Change the fight parameters. You will run out of mana with long encounters and pvp gear.
